This page serves as a compact list of all unique [[painting]] textures which have ever existed in officially released versions of ''Minecraft''. For an overview on when each texture was changed, see the appropriate [[History of textures]] subpages.

Note: the textures shown in this page are upscaled tenfold for display purposes.
